full_summary:
### VISSC II RFI/LOI July 2023: Expression of Interest for Victoria-class In-Service Support Contract II

**Solicitation Number:** W8483-197521/F
**Reference Number:** PW-SLE-008-29127
**Issue Date:** 2023-07-20
**Closing Date:** 2023-09-15T14:00:00

**Background:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites interested suppliers to submit an expression of interest (EOI) for the Victoria-class In-Service Support Contract II (VISSC II). This contract will support the sustainment of the Victoria-class submarine fleet.

**Objectives:**
The objective of this Request for Information (RFI)/ Letter of Interest (LOI) is to engage industry in the development of the VISSC II contract, which will replace the current VISSC contract expiring on June 30, 2027.

**Content:**
The RFI/LOI includes the following key components:

*   Overview of the Victoria-class submarine sustainment enterprise
*   Procurement timeline
*   Application of Value Proposition (VP) and Industrial and Technological Benefits (ITB) framework
*   Performance Work Statement and Performance Management Specification
*   Basis of payment and contractual terms and conditions
*   Opportunity for industry feedback and questions

**Response Requirements:**
Suppliers are invited to submit their responses to the RFI/LOI questions by the closing date of 2023-09-15T14:00:00. The responses will be used to inform Canada's options analysis while developing the procurement and sustainment strategies.

**Note:**
This RFI/LOI is not a call for tender or Request for Proposal (RFP). No agreement or contract will be entered into based on this RFI/LOI. Suppliers will not be reimbursed for any costs incurred in participating in this RFI/LOI.

**Contact Information:**

*   Robert DiNiro, Public Works and Government Services Canada
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
*   Phone: (613) 203-3973
*   Email: [robert.diniro@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:robert.diniro@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Documentations are available for download at
